lead_paragraph: The year began with PGA Tour rookie Smylie Kaufman hitting the opening tee shot into the blue horizon at Kapalua. It ended 319 days later when PGA Tour rookie Mackenzie Hughes rolled in an 18-foot par putt from the fringe to win at Sea Island.

headline.print_headline: A Year in Review Based on Every Club in the Bag
headline.main: A Year in Review Based on Every Club in the Bag
